subject: [Radiance-general] How does Radiance handle glazingtransmittance - dependent on the angle of incidence?
body:
Hi Amalie,

the answer depends on the material model you choose. Check material.pdf
which comes with the Radiance distribution. Peter Apian-Bennewitz
recently published a nice article giving an overview on the various
models and their implications: http://arxiv.org/pdf/1307.4214.pdf

Cheers, Lars.
